title: Good Zeit and Good Luck 6/12: Prenup, Kristen Bell, Dave Chappelle, Robert Fuller
itunes:title: Good Zeit and Good Luck 6/12: Prenup, Kristen Bell, Dave Chappelle, Robert Fuller
description:
On this edition of Good Zeit and Good Luck Jack and Miles discuss Melania adjusting her prenup, Kristen Bell catching flack for her controversial children's book, Dave Chappelle has released another incredibly poignant special, and the death of Robert Fuller whose police report leaves many questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
